d.help: Path to the folder containing the training image files or the images to predict

t.help: Thresholding strategy: {auto, otsu, isodata, yen, li, triangle} or numeric (percentile <1, absolute ≥1). ‘auto’ selects Otsu or Triangle based on skewness.

min.help: Remove contours smaller than this area (pixels²); raise it to suppress speckles and debris.

de.help: Computation device for PyTorch (e.g. 'cpu', '0' for GPU).

vi.help: IoU threshold for merging overlapping detections during voting.

vm.help: Minimum number of votes required to keep a consolidated detection.

b.help: Batch size used for running YOLO predictions.

y.help: Path to the YAML file used to resolve class names.

dist.help: Minimum Euclidean spacing between seed peaks (in pixels) before watershed; peaks closer than this are merged. Lower values split touching objects more; higher values yield fewer splits.

ws.help: Enable watershed splitting of touching objects after binarization; helps separate merged instances.

pub.help: Print contours as in publication style.

s.help: Target size (in pixels) for training images.

e.help: Total number of complete training passes through the entire dataset.

m.help: Path to the YOLO model file to be used as the starting point for training (pretrained weights or a custom checkpoint).

dbg.help: Enable or disable debug mode to display additional logs and diagnostic information.

v.help: Fraction of the dataset to reserve for validation during training (value between 0 and 1).
